original_text: They will stand a long way from the city because they are afraid. They do not want to suffer in the same way. They will say, ‘ Terrible trouble has come to you, Babylon! Great city! Powerful city! It is very bad for you! In one single hour God has destroyed you!’ They will stand a long way from the city because they are afraid. They do not want to suffer in the same way. They will say, ‘ Terrible trouble has come to you, Babylon! Great city! Powerful city! It is very bad for you! In one single hour God has destroyed you!’ They will stand a long way from the city because they are afraid. They do not want to suffer in the same way. They will say,
korean_text: 그의 고통을 무서워하여 멀리 서서 이르되 화 있도다 화 있도다 큰 성, 견고한 성 바벨론이여 한 시간에 네 심판이 이르렀다 하리로다

sentences.original_text: They will stand a long way from the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 도시에서 멀리 떨어져 서 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: They do not want to suffer in the same way
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 같은 방식으로 고통받고 싶지 않다

sentences.original_text: Terrible trouble has come to you
It is very bad for you!
